definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Tone adjustment can meet different audition environment.
sentences.chinese: 音质调节功能能满足各种听音环境。

sentences.english: Women Current in the video singing a little tune, sound beautiful, good to hear.
sentences.chinese: 一次女流在视频里唱的小调子，音质很美，很好听。

sentences.english: The third improvement is audio quality, which has taken a gigantic step forward.
sentences.chinese: 第三个改进是音质，这一点相较以前迈出了一大步。

sentences.english: Digital recording offers the best sound quality.
sentences.chinese: 数位式的录音提供最好的音质。

sentences.english: All having happend just wanted to show us the excellent sound quality.
sentences.chinese: 一切都为了向我们展示它出色的音质效果。

sentences.english: Good to hear an English song, very lyrical, good sound quality.
sentences.chinese: 挺好听的一首英文歌，很抒情，音质不错。

sentences.english: Plantronics Encore H91N is a top-of-the-line model that offers all-day comfort and superior sound quality.
sentences.chinese: 提供全天舒适感和优美音质的第一流型号。

sentences.english: Because of the high quality and low bit rate, G.
sentences.chinese: 由于具有高音质和低码速率的特点，G。

sentences.english: Wall thickness and other variations have a tremendous influence on the quality of the sound.
sentences.chinese: 管身厚度和其它的变化有在音质上的影响非常显著。

sentences.english: Is it mono sound or stereo sound?
sentences.chinese: 是立体声，可惜音质麻麻。

sentences.english: Compact discs have brought about a vast improvement in recorded sound quality.
sentences.chinese: 激光唱片极大地提高了录音的音质。

sentences.english: Improved measures have been suggested for making the acoustical design being more practical and perfect.
sentences.chinese: 为使音质设计更切实际和完美，还提出不少改进措施。

sentences.english: We roamed around our usual haunts to test out both data and voice services, and the phone had no issues whatsoever with either.
sentences.chinese: 主要测试的是数据服务以及通话的音质。

sentences.english: Noise-cancelling microphone enhances sound quality and voice-dialing performance.
sentences.chinese: 降噪麦克风提高音质和语音拨号的性能。

sentences.english: High quality headphones which grant outstanding performance to call.
sentences.chinese: 高清晰听筒，使通话具有水晶般出色音质。

sentences.english: The big sound comes from iMainGo’s high-output titanium speakers.
sentences.chinese: 高音质来自IMainGo高输出钛扬声器。

definition: loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
